greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array read by antidiagonals: T(n,m) = number of matchings (i.e., Hosoya index) in K_n X K_m.
comment: Examination of values modulus a small prime yields several patterns.
T(n,m) == 0 (mod 5) for n==4 (mod 5) and m<>2 and except when m=n=4.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..496
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Independent Edge Set
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Rook Graph
example: The start of the sequence as table:
